  • Commands / Verbs Usage

Commands / Verbs Usage¶

create¶

"create" type name [attribeqn : attrib"="value]

Create type object with name name and attribeqn initially embeded in it.

Caution

Name your objects carefully. DO NOT to name them as “sin” or “d” which are predefined. Using special characters like asterisks, slashes should also be avoided as much as possible.

All the commands input after name will be directly passed to __init__() of their own classes. User should strictly obey the grammar of their constructors. Refer to specific help if needed.

set¶

"set" name (attribeqn : attrib"="value)+

Set name‘s attrib as value. It can handle multiple assignment.

start¶

"start" simname endtime

This is a specialize command to start a simulation simname lasting for endtime in sec.

print¶

"print" name (attribname)*

Print name‘s attribute attribname. You can give multiple attribname separated by space.

list¶

"list" [typename]

Return the roster of a specific type typename or all types without typename.

alias¶

"alias" (aliaseqn)+

delete¶

"del"|"d"|"delete" (objname)+

Delete one or multiple objects

help¶

"help" commname

Return help info of above commands.
